cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and difficult to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks and the body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Smooth, easy depth adjustment.
The Bosch 1617EVS router is powerful. Capable of producing 2.25 HP of mechanical energy. Plenty of power and easy to control with wood handles.
Soft start feature is appreciated. Variable speed is beneficial for different size bits and types of wood.
cont.entity_b: Wireless storage feature does not work with NTFS formatted drives.

cont.entity_a: The router is durable and well-suited for various woodworking tasks.
Finding the right orientation for the table is challenging.
cont.entity_b: Installation is simple with provided CD and materials.

cont.entity_a: Speed controller is failing after little use, though the part is inexpensive.
The router box was previously opened and some parts were missing.

cont.entity_b: Router functions well, but firmware issues affect performance. Router works well with DD-WRT software.

cont.entity_a: Great router but had two cracks in the base plate.

cont.entity_b: No wireless N connectivity with certain devices. Wireless N devices function as G due to firmware limitations.
Good range when functioning properly. Less range than older Netgear Wireless-G router.
Router crashes occasionally and requires multiple reboots. Frequent reboots needed due to USB hard drive issues.
Setup wizard on CD did not work with Windows XP. Setup procedure is straightforward and easy to follow.
Router locks up when ports are opened for forwarding traffic.
